text: -tyaqpAM cauSha#dhInAM ca saqdhAMvA la#Bata uqBayaqsyA-va#ruddhyaiqviSA#KOq yUpO# Bavatiq dvE hyE#tE dEqvatEq samRu#ddhyai maiqtra(gg) SvEqtamA la#BEta vAruqNaM kRuqShNaM jyOgA#mayAvIqyan maiqtrO Bava#ti miqtrENaiqvAsmaiq varu#Na(gm) Samayatiq yad-vA#ruqNaH sAqkShAdEqvaina#M ~MvaruNapAqSAn mu#~jcatyuqta yadIqtAsuqrBava#tiq jIva#tyEqva dEqvA vai puShTiqM nAvi#ndaqn - [  ]  55
